Fake Profile Male.description: Creating and using fake profiles for fraudulent, deceptive, or malicious activities.

Phishing.description: A cyber attack using deceptive messages to steal sensitive data or credentials.

Cyber Terrorism.description: Using digital means to spread fear, disrupt infrastructure, or promote extremist ideologies.

Social Media Account Hacking Male.description: Unauthorized access and takeover of social media accounts for fraud or harassment.

Online Gambling Betting Frauds.description: Scams related to illegal online betting and gambling platforms.

Business Email Compromise Email Takeover.description: Email fraud involving unauthorized access to business email accounts.

Provocative Speech for Unlawful Acts.description: Inciting violence, hatred, or unlawful actions through online speech.

Matrimonial Honey Trapping Scam.description: Deceptive relationships to extract money or sensitive information.

Fake News.description: Spreading misinformation and false narratives to manipulate public perception.

Cyber Stalking Bullying Male.description: Online harassment, intimidation, or repeated threats towards individuals.

Defamation.description: Publishing false statements to damage a person's or entitys reputation.

Cyber Pornography Male.description: Illegal creation, distribution, or access to pornographic content online.

Sending Obscene Material Male.description: Sharing explicit, offensive, or vulgar content via digital platforms.

Intellectual Property Thefts.description: Unauthorized use or theft of copyrighted or patented material.

Cyber Enabled Human Trafficking Cyber Sl.description: Using digital platforms to facilitate human trafficking or forced labor.

Cyber Blackmailing and Threatening.description: Coercing victims through threats, demands, or extortion online.

Online Piracy.description: Unauthorized distribution of copyrighted digital content, such as movies or software.

Spoofing.description: Falsifying digital identities to mislead users or exploit systems.
